CustomField.description: BIZ-721 // Used in Contract Email Template
CustomField.formula:
if(Second_Year_Software_Total__c!=0, '2nd Year Uplift = '+TEXT(Round((Second_Year_Software_Total__c- First_Year_Software_Total__c )/First_Year_Software_Total__c*100,2))+'%', '')&' ' &
if(Third_Year_Software_Total__c!=0,'3rd Year Uplift = '+TEXT(ROUND((Third_Year_Software_Total__c - Second_Year_Software_Total__c )/Second_Year_Software_Total__c*100,2))+'%', '' )&' ' &
if(Fourth_Year_Software_Total__c!=0,'4th Year Uplift = '+TEXT(ROUND(( Fourth_Year_Software_Total__c - Third_Year_Software_Total__c )/Third_Year_Software_Total__c*100,2))+'%', '' )&' ' &
if(Fifth_Year_Software_Total__c!=0,'5th Year Uplift = '+TEXT(ROUND(( Fifth_Year_Software_Total__c - Fourth_Year_Software_Total__c )/Fourth_Year_Software_Total__c*100,2))+'%', '' )
CustomField.label: Uplift %
